body: Dear Mostapha and Chien Si,   Thank you so much for your kind help and your great tools!   Based on the model you sent back to me, I have further tested the possibility of interoperability between HB, GB and DesignBuilder (DB).   GB does export the gbXML file and geometrically works fine with DB. But, the schedule, load and construction information (which I assigned in HB) lost when imported in DesignBuilder, and some information like building area of each zone showed in the exported gbXML file didn't match with the actual building area in the GH model.   I also found some tricky problems when I used some of the updated HB components, so I left my questions in the gh file and look forward to hearing your suggestions. I have attached the gbXML file generated by GB and hope it helps.   Thank you again for your kindness!   Best, Ding Q1 [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8RV-wNVbxHsUG6sJEIxRhvbKqVdcDNZzoDkhkL9*hmIMZZ1EXQT4nbdmOvaavrumJiMR95r3vPj0tZ9OBCCsXTy/Q1.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8QsI366WpH8rPY*c9BrDVWgHfsDjfyyhVBNZ5xbmbKVFYDyURHL29va63oscpqHeHttWL25QrgTrGKoNZY-SLR9/Q7figure1FailedtofindSuperMarketInfilHalfOn.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8QsI366WpH8rPY*c9BrDVWgHfsDjfyyhVBNZ5xbmbKVFYDyURHL29va63oscpqHeHttWL25QrgTrGKoNZY-SLR9/Q7figure1FailedtofindSuperMarketInfilHalfOn.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8QsI366WpH8rPY*c9BrDVWgHfsDjfyyhVBNZ5xbmbKVFYDyURHL29va63oscpqHeHttWL25QrgTrGKoNZY-SLR9/Q7figure1FailedtofindSuperMarketInfilHalfOn.jpg) [Q7 (figure 1)-Failed to find SuperMarket Infil Half On](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8QsI366WpH8rPY*c9BrDVWgHfsDjfyyhVBNZ5xbmbKVFYDyURHL29va63oscpqHeHttWL25QrgTrGKoNZY-SLR9/Q7figure1FailedtofindSuperMarketInfilHalfOn.jpg)[Q8 (figure 2)-Area did not match with the GH model](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dUBGrCUuK8Q*0Q5Qo8aNPzxyI1KkKHQn8dMz5wtOuwMxdaKSorrCQRm0dTN0988D7IIO8Ww2V5sh7s9QCGqKAdvN1WPCEVYJ/Q8figure2AreadidnotmatchwiththeGHmodel.jpg)
